name: CENTRE FOR RURAL DEVELOPMENT AND PLANNING
briefDescription: CENTER FOR RURAL DEVELOPMENT AND PLANNING.(CRDP) have a registered voluntary And charitable organisation. It works for development of upliftment rural areas of Balasore district of Odisha.It is a non-profitable & charitable voluntary organisation. Mainly we works for water & sanitation, Agriculture development in rural areas,and Rural development  which is needy based in poor family.We creat awareness campaign  themself by our volunteers through  Rally, meeting with workshop.Our  NGO have registered  12AA & 80G incomtax Act & FCRA Act 2010  Which is illegiable for receiving Donation from others.    So you can  Help them as your capabilty  and God wiil blessed you
